Exemplars of undying violence, graveknight warmasters are devastating forces on the battlefield, able to spur allies to ever greater levels of violence. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Graveknight Warmaster](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1869) **Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 110 **Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +26, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +24, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +25, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +5 **Int** +3 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +6 **Items** _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, [Heavy Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=70) (20 bolts), [War Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=46) --- **AC** 38 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +24 **Will** +24 **HP** 255 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Hungry Armor** A creature that Strikes a graveknight warmaster with a melee weapon must succeed at a DC 31 Reflex save or be [disarmed](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) of that weapon. If the creature critically fails, the weapon ends up in the graveknight's space. A creature that hits a graveknight warmaster with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack must succeed at a DC 31 Reflex save or become [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the graveknight until the end of its next turn, it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79), or the graveknight moves, whichever comes first.
**Rejuvenation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When a graveknight is destroyed, their armor rebuilds their body over the course of 1d10 days—or more quickly if the armor is worn by a living host (see Graveknight Armor below). If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts. A graveknight can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating their armor (such as with [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76)), transporting it to the [Positive Energy Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=3), or throwing it into the heart of a volcano.
**Sacrilegious Aura** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64)) 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it, with a +23 counteract modifier.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** war flail +29 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 3d10+14 bludgeoning plus 1d6 electricity **Melee** fist +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d6+14 bludgeoning plus 1d6 electricity **Ranged** heavy crossbow +25 ([Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 2](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 3d10+6 piercing plus 1d6 electricity **Devastating Blast** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The graveknight unleashes a 30-foot cone of lightning. Creatures in the area take 8d12 electricity damage (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The graveknight can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds. **Exemplar of Violence** ([Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The graveknight attempts a Strike as their armor flashes with sinister power that spurs allies to violence. After the Strike, allies who can see the graveknight can use a reaction to Step or Stride, but they must end this movement in a space adjacent to an enemy. One ally of the graveknight's choice can instead use a reaction to Strike. **Graveknight's Curse** This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour; **Saving Throw** DC 39 Will save; **Onset** 1 hour; **Stage 1** [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) and can't remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 2** doomed 2, hampered 10, and can't remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 3** dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight **Phantom Mount** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33)) The graveknight summons a supernatural mount as per [_phantom steed_](/Spells.aspx?ID=221), heightened to 7th level. The steed has AC 34, Fort +23, Ref +20, Will +20, and 85 Hit Points. If the steed is destroyed, the graveknight must wait 1 hour before using this ability again. **Ruinous Weapons** Any weapon or [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack the graveknight uses gains the effects of the _+1 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280)_ and [_greater shock_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303) weapon runes. **Weapon Master** The graveknight has access to the [critical specialization effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) of any weapons they wield.
name: Graveknight Warmaster
